summary: This bill, HR 4919, proposes to designate the United States Postal Service facility located at 765 West Old Route 66 in Ash Fork, Arizona, as the "Fayrene Hume Post Office." The bill explicitly states the new name and mandates that any existing references to the original facility be replaced with the new designation. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives on August 8, 2025, and referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform. It is in the public domain.
